entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High 8.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of freezing rain. Low minus 1. POP 60%

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50.
